---
title: km-package-uninstall
---
<!-- DO NOT MODIFY THIS FILE!  It was generated by help2md 1.48.4. -->
## Summary

Uninstall a Keyman keyboard package
## Syntax

```bash
km-package-uninstall [-h] [-s] [--version] [-v] [-vv] id
```

### Parameters

`id` <br>
Keyman keyboard id

`-h`, `--help` <br>
__optional__ <br>
show this help message and exit

`-s`, `--shared` <br>
__optional__ <br>
Uninstall from shared area `/usr/local`

`--version` <br>
__optional__ <br>
show program's version number and exit

`-v`, `--verbose` <br>
__optional__ <br>
verbose logging

`-vv`, `--veryverbose` <br>
__optional__ <br>
very verbose logging

## Description

Uninstall a Keyman keyboard package.
## See also

- [`km-package-install`](km-package-install)
 <br>
- [`km-config`](km-config)
 <br>
- [`km-package-list-installed`](km-package-list-installed)
